about_the_game:
Hero Hillding

A berserker from the coldest of colds. Holding onto the fighting philosophy most raw and rough, he goes rogue in the northernmost part of the continent. As a berserker, Hillding has no armor. His dodge is forward leap and chop. Releasing skill consumes Wrath. When his health is too low, he enters a rampage. Wrath is a mechanic unique to Hillding. Wrath builds up when Hillding normal attacks, dodges, deals damage or takes damage.

Tornado Decimates Donkey Farm：Consume 20 Wrath. Spin rapidly and sweep through the room, wreaking havoc on the way. Hold the skill button to consume Wrath and charge. Longer charge grants longer duration, higher damage and faster attack rate. Can consume up to 100 Wrath.

Tiger Devours Lamb：Consume 20 Wrath. Launch 2 powerful forward slashes. Chance to loot some treasures and food from enemy.

Sneaky Rat Rubs Its Tummy：Consume 50 Wrath. Throw roast meat upward, eat it and restore health.

Elephant Thrusts His Leg：Consume 20 Wrath. Perform a powerful kick that pulls you forward, knocking back enemies to a great distance. If the target bumps into any hard object, it takes extra damage and gets stunned.
